ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate (was RE: Lvl 48 song ?)
ygData.msgSnippet: i am skeptical too about imbrued.  i know all the armor drops in both planes were made much more rare, but at least we have seen pieces of it all dropped since
ygData.messageBody:
i am skeptical too about imbrued. i know all the armor drops in both planes
were made much more rare, but at least we have seen pieces of it all dropped
since then. i have yet to see imbrued.

the ykesha/rapier is a toss-up for me. ykesha has the proc, rapier has 1
better delay (negligible, but its there) and nice 5str 4gi stats. since if
i did use a ykesha it would be in my secondary hand only and since it will
proc less there, i am using the rapier for the stats. and i like wielding 2
PoH weps =) when i got my rapier and lute i was lucky enough to be the only
bard there. when i got the six note blade, i was lucky enough to win a
50/50 lotto.

Shada

> I keep hearing Imbrued is dropped on scorn banshees, but I
> won't believe it
> til I see it. Not too interested in the rapier either - if I
> were to get one
> and we killed Mr. Maestro that would knock me out of lottoing
> rights on his
> loots. =) Either way I won't give up a Yak for a rapier.
>
> Take care,
> Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
> Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
> Veeshan
